name: part_005
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】Lapis Lazuli ⧸ 重大告知アリ！【 #鷹嶺ルイ重大告知LIVE 】 [PHrZ_dRSy_4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui and Laplus Darkness performing the ending of 'Himitsu no Mekashigoto'.
Solo performance of 'CHARISMA' by Takane Lui.
Solo performance of 'FIRST CRY' by Takane Lui.

subtitles.original: 今日もひみつの Take off
subtitles.english: Today as well, a secret takeoff

subtitles.original: 媚びたこの鼻に
subtitles.english: On this nose that flattered

subtitles.original: 泥を塗って放って描くわ
subtitles.english: I'll smear mud, cast it away, and draw

subtitles.original: 情操 撫でた爪を立てて
subtitles.english: Setting my claws on the stroked sentiments

subtitles.original: 信じられるものは
subtitles.english: The only thing I can believe in

subtitles.original: 自分だけだと思い込んで
subtitles.english: Is myself, so I'll keep convincing myself

subtitles.original: 進み続けて
subtitles.english: and move forward

subtitles.original: あの子みたいにすれば
subtitles.english: If I act like that girl

subtitles.original: 君じゃそれは無理だ
subtitles.english: That's impossible for you

subtitles.original: 言わせておけばいいさ
subtitles.english: Let them say what they want

subtitles.original: たった独り 逆境の先
subtitles.english: All alone, beyond adversity

subtitles.original: あいつらからフォーカス
subtitles.english: Focus away from those people

subtitles.original: 私の邪魔 させやしない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone get in my way

subtitles.original: 分かってたがね 見据えた先
subtitles.english: I knew it, looking at what's ahead

subtitles.original: 隘路抜けた空へと
subtitles.english: Toward the sky through the narrow path

subtitles.original: テイク 私を見なさいなんて
subtitles.english: Take it, as if saying "look at me"

subtitles.original: Bad Boy
subtitles.english: Bad Boy

subtitles.original: 失敗は止まった時
subtitles.english: Failure is when you stop

subtitles.original: 今日も挑み果ての
subtitles.english: Today as well, at the end of the challenge

subtitles.original: 君に無いものは無いと
subtitles.english: There's nothing you don't have

subtitles.original: 信じられるものを
subtitles.english: Until you find something

subtitles.original: 見つけ出すまで どんな日だって
subtitles.english: To believe in, no matter the day

subtitles.original: 笑い飛ばすんだ
subtitles.english: Just laugh it off

subtitles.original: Na na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na na...

subtitles.original: あの子はもう終わりだ
subtitles.english: That girl is already finished

subtitles.original: これ以上は無いね
subtitles.english: There's nothing more than this

subtitles.original: 言わせておけばいいさ
subtitles.english: Let them say what they want

subtitles.original: いつの日か寝ても覚めても
subtitles.english: Someday, whether asleep or awake,

subtitles.original: 夢見てた大喝采
subtitles.english: the cheers I dreamed of

subtitles.original: 私はここで死にたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to die here

subtitles.original: 一章の旅 逆境の先
subtitles.english: A first chapter journey, beyond adversity

subtitles.original: あいつらからフォーカス
subtitles.english: Focus away from those people

subtitles.original: 私の邪魔 させやしない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone get in my way

subtitles.original: 分かってたがね 見据えた先
subtitles.english: I knew it, looking at what's ahead

subtitles.original: 隘路抜けた空へと
subtitles.english: Toward the sky through the narrow path

subtitles.original: テイク 私を見なさいなんて
subtitles.english: Take it, as if saying "look at me"

subtitles.original: Bad Boy
subtitles.english: Bad Boy

subtitles.original: Bad Boy...
subtitles.english: Bad Boy...

subtitles.original: 誰かに言われなくたって
subtitles.english: Even if nobody tells me

subtitles.original: 私の方が もっと嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate myself even more

subtitles.original: うるさいな 騒々しい視界を塞いで
subtitles.english: Be quiet, blocking out the noisy view

subtitles.original: 惨めな理由を書き連ねる
subtitles.english: Listing out miserable reasons

subtitles.original: 教室にずっと居残り
subtitles.english: Staying behind in the classroom forever

subtitles.original: 窓の向こうに黒い影があって
subtitles.english: There was a black shadow outside the window

subtitles.original: 何も言わずに こっちを見てた
subtitles.english: Looking this way without saying anything

subtitles.original: 私はあなたに救われたくて泣くんじゃない
subtitles.english: I'm not crying because I want you to save me

subtitles.original: 産声は 止められないもの
subtitles.english: A first cry is something that can't be stopped

subtitles.original: 何千回と もう一度
subtitles.english: Narrowly escaping death once again,

subtitles.original: 死に損なうのを
subtitles.english: for the thousandth time

subtitles.original: 希望と絶望の夜中を纏って
subtitles.english: Clad in a midnight of hope and despair

subtitles.original: 醜い光を許したのは
subtitles.english: The one who allowed the ugly light

subtitles.original: 他ならない私だった
subtitles.english: Was none other than myself

subtitles.original: 息をして
subtitles.english: Take a breath

subtitles.original: 目を開けて
subtitles.english: Open your eyes

subtitles.original: これが最後かと記すのではないよ
subtitles.english: I'm not writing it down as if it's the end

subtitles.original: 知りたくもないよ
subtitles.english: I don't even want to know

subtitles.original: 優しいね
subtitles.english: It's kind,

subtitles.original: 刻々と闇は寄り添って
subtitles.english: the darkness draws closer moment by moment

subtitles.original: 解けない答えを塗りつぶした
subtitles.english: Painting over the insoluble answers
